statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state = 'California' AND city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT first_name, email, city, state, country FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND state = 'California'
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE age >= 25 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY city ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' LIMIT 5
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, email FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 40
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE category = 'food';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, category, preference_value FROM preferences JOIN customers ON preferences.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE category = 'Music' ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE category = 'Sports' AND preference_value = 'Soccer';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customers WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_category='Food';
SELECT customer_id, country, profession FROM demographics WHERE education_level='Bachelor';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND region = 'Europe' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.country, d.city FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.education_level = 'Graduate' LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.first_name, p.preference_category, p.preference_value FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.preference_category = 'Food';

SELECT c.first_name, c.email, d.country, d.city, p.preference_category FROM (customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id) JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.preference_value = 'Italian' ORDER BY c.first_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT id, education_level, income FROM Demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Preferences WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT strategy_name, target_demographics, marketing_budget FROM MarketingStrategies WHERE marketing_budget < 10000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE gender = 'Female' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT CustomerProfiles.first_name, CustomerProfiles.last_name, Demographics.location, Demographics.income FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN Demographics ON CustomerProfiles.id = Demographics.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' AND (age BETWEEN 25 AND 40) OR gender = 'Male';

SELECT CustomerProfiles.first_name, CustomerProfiles.last_name, Preferences.product_category, MarketingStrategies.strategy_name FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN Preferences ON CustomerProfiles.id = Preferences.customer_id JOIN MarketingStrategies ON Preferences.id = MarketingStrategies.id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, income FROM customers WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT purchase_date, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, age ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, income FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT location, marital_status, occupation FROM demographics WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT strategy_name, target_demographics, target_preferences FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id > 2;
